name: Compromise Accounts - Social Media Accounts (T1586.001)
description: Detects potential compromise or unauthorized access attempts targeting social media accounts. This may involve credential reuse, phishing, or token abuse targeting social platforms.
author: Wahid Hendrawan
query: process.args:(*facebook.com* OR *twitter.com* OR *x.com* OR *linkedin.com* OR *instagram.com* OR *login* OR *access_token*) AND (event.outcome:failure OR event.action:authentication_failure)
